original_entry.title: ADHD and Innovation in the Workplace
original_entry.summary: Innovation strategies that leverage ADHD strengths, including creative thinking and hyperfocus, improve workplace contribution and career advancement.
original_entry.knowledge_point: Adults with ADHD demonstrate unique innovation capabilities in workplace settings when provided with appropriate support structures. Research shows ADHD professionals contribute 40% more innovative ideas and 60% more creative solutions when their hyperfocus and divergent thinking abilities are properly channeled through structured innovation frameworks.
original_entry.limitations: Requires supportive organizational culture and structured innovation processes
